invalid_number:
Please use a valid number: `!words <current total>`, `!words +<words to add to total>`, or `!words -<words to remove from total>`.
For example: `!words 1500`, `!words +300`, or `!words -200`.
words_show_all:
Word counts:
- This month ({month}): **{monthly}**
- All time: **{total}**
wordcount_invalid_day: Could not determine today‚Äôs word count goal. Please try again later.
wordcount_today: Your goal for today is **{target} words**. You are currently at **{currentWordCount} words**.
goal_set: Your word count goal has been set to **{goal} words**. That's **{perDay} words per day**.
goal_show: Your goal for this month is {goal} words ({perDay} per day).
goal_none: You don‚Äôt have a goal set for this month. Use `!goal 50000` to set one.
congrats: We knew you could do it! https://y.yarn.co/32615f26-f724-452b-9d04-1a954bc7a5ef_text.gif
hydrate: Remember your drinks everyone! Your coffee? Getting cold. Your tea? It's been steeping long enough. Bottom's up!
help:
**Available Commands:**
‚Ä¢ `!help`: Show this helpful message.

**Stats:**
‚Ä¢ `!words`: Show your current monthly word count.
‚Ä¢ `!words all`: Show both your monthly and all-time totals.
‚Ä¢ `!leaderboard`: Show the top writers for the current month.
‚Ä¢ `!goal <number>`: Set a personal monthly goal.
‚Ä¢ `!wordcount`: Get your daily target word count for today.

**Word updates:**
‚Ä¢ `!words <number>`: Set your word count for this month (e.g., `!words 1500`).
‚Ä¢ `!words +<number>`: Add words to your monthly (e.g., `!words +300`).
‚Ä¢ `!words -<number>`: Subtract words from your monthly total (e.g., `!words -200`).
     ‚Ä¢ You can add `yesterday` at the end of these commands to add it to yesterday's total. Useful when adding it past midnight on the 1st.

**Misc.**
‚Ä¢ `!cheer`: Get a motivational cheer!
‚Ä¢ `!congrats`: Get a congratulatory message!
‚Ä¢ `!hydrate`: Friendly reminder to stay hydrated!
‚Ä¢ `!prompt`: Get a random writing prompt.
error_saving: Something went wrong while saving your data.
